name: Dumb Stickman Run 4 (Challenge Gravity and don’t die running in danger zone like dumber guy. Win the scary race and be a happy man)
name_original: Dumb Stickman Run 4 (Challenge Gravity and don’t die running in danger zone like dumber guy. Win the scary race and be a happy man)
description:
Rush to face the gravity and jump in the safe zone to become a doodle roadrunner!

Prove your athletic skills in running and jumping in this doodle road runner madness. Dare to face gravity and do cool high jumps like a tough guy! Don't be dumb to die, find ways to run and survive to the goal at the end, its an uphill battle not to kill him.

What’s Inside?
• COOL DOODLE STYLE ARTWORK
• DUMB PROOF CONTROLS
• COOL STICKMAN STYLE HERO
• LOTS OF WAYS TO DIE :D GRAVITY, ERASERS, AND SPIKES!!

Be an amazing doodle road runner guy in Dumb Stickman Run 4. Run and jump in the right zone! Share with your friends and family.

Happy jumping :)
